description: Stylesheet for managing themes and UI elements in the Tic Tac Toe frontend application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with background color and text alignment.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including animation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with layout and display properties.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links in the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes (light/dark) with interactive styles.
